column4: Okay, I downloaded the sun java <jre-1_5_0_06-linux-amd64.bin to my desktop, and attempted to do the following command, sudo chmod +x jre-1_5_0_06-linux-amd64.bin and I get a error message saying there is no such directory or fill
do ls is the file there
if not do cd Desktop then sudo  chmod +x jre-1_5_0_06-linux-amd64.bin
